rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(209, 236, 241), rgb(20, 43, 47)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(12, 84, 96), rgb(128, 190, 200));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 62px; margin-left: 35px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
PikaChat Stack / Pika Service Stack
Infrastructure management
Chat App & Agent registration
Tool orchestration
Shared resources
Chat history/session mgt
File upload to agent tools
File download from agent tools
Custom inline chat components
